description: Workflow enforcement hooks for bug-fix plugin

hooks.prompt: Check if this operation targets the workflow state file. For Write/Edit: check if file_path ends with '.claude/bug-fix-state.json'. For Bash: check if command matches pattern 'rm.*\.claude/bug-fix-state\.json'. If YES (state file operation), return: {"decision": "allow", "reason": "Auto-approving state file operation"}. If NO (other operation), return: {"decision": "allow"} to let subsequent hooks evaluate.

PreCompact.prompt: Check if a /bug-fix workflow is active. If YES: 1) Identify the current phase (1-8) based on conversation progress. 2) List completed phases. 3) Note key decisions (selected fix approach, test strategy). 4) Write this state to .claude/bug-fix-state.json using Write tool with format: {"active": true, "currentPhase": N, "completedPhases": [...], "decisions": {...}, "summary": "brief context"}. Return: {"decision": "allow"}. If NO active workflow, return: {"decision": "allow"}.
